page.title: 15Facilities for Families
page.content: There are two toddler gropus in the district that take place once a week on different days,on different sides of the town,there is a playgroup twice a week in the old school building where children can be left under supervision.There are brownie packs and cub-scouts packs,a tennis club and a childrens dancing class.Also thee is a young wives group and a womans institute. The clinic is situated in Penyffordd for mothers with babies to use.There are no nusery schools in Penyffordd but there are two in Wrexham.There are two county primary schools in the area but the nearest high schools are Castell Alun high school , Hope or Hawarden high school.There are no clothes shops but the grocery store sells baby food. By A Griffiths,M Danesh.
